mapper.select: /* kr.or.hku.admin.mapper.ScholarshipMapper.scholarshipVO */ SELECT scls_cd , scls_nm , scls_amt , scls_aply_bgng_dt , scls_aply_end_dt , scls_terms FROM scholarship WHERE 1=1 AND scls_del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY scls_cd DESC

/* kr.or.hku.admin.mapper.ScholarshipMapper.deleteScls */ SELECT sclsap_no AS sclsap_no , c.scls_cd AS scls_cd , c.scls_nm AS scls_nm , a.std_no AS std_no , b.std_nm AS std_nm , TO_CHAR(sclsap_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as sclsap_dt , aprv_stts_cd , a.atch_file_no FROM scholarship_aply a INNER join student b ON a.std_no = b.std_no INNER join scholarship c ON a.scls_cd = c.scls_cd ORDER BY a.sclsap_dt DESC
